::KitKat::

She was hit by a shot in the hip while in wolf mode. She went behind a tree 
and transformed into bot mode. She pulled out her gun and shot at the fuzor. 
  She saw Quickstrike tackle Cheetor.
"Blast it all!"
She transformed back to wolf mode and rafter the fuzor.  She leaded at him 
to tackle him, with her teeth ready to tear into him and her claws ready to 
rip into his sides.

----------Original Message-----------
>From: "Talon Harvilicz" <wilddance_mare@...>
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>Subject: Neo Beast Wars
>Quickstrike/Cheetor:
>
>
>
>
>Quickstrike pressed his shoulder tightly to the tree. He kept his eye on 
>the
>Maximal. Cheetor shot at him twice. The Fuzor ducked over. The side of the
>tree shattered, and the hit almost got his shoulder. He could see the kid
>was scared. If there was a way he could get around to him and hit him with
>venom he might be able to end this faster.
>
>Quickstrike dashed to another tree, to his right. Cheetor kept firing. He
>even screamed at one point. Quickstrike paused, watching him. He decided to
>take a risk. This was one Maximal. There were at least three Predacons in
>the area, even if two were female. He never misjudged the opposite sex.
>
>"Kid," he called out and fired at Cheetor. A second later, as Cheetor was
>dodging and wincing, Quickstrike charged out. He ran as fast as his legs
>would carry him. His feet made too much noise to be able to sneak up on 
>him.
>He plan was to catch him by surprise.
>
>The Maximal picked himself up and fired as he kept moving. He was only a 
>few
>feet away. A shot hit his foot, sending him down, but at the same time,
>Quickstrike grabbed him, and dug the long fangs into his side.
